name: Momentum Fighter
description:
Momentum Fighter is a game made for a workshop in my school class.

I made this game with 1 classmate and 1 from an another class who worked on graphics. 

People who worked on the project : 

tiimot (dev), Lucie fribault (dev), SirLazz (graphs), thanks to Alexis Bouillaud for the sound design !

We made this game in 1 week, the game is a starship fight 1 vs 1 playable in multiplayer local, your goal is to destroy your opponent with your ship but be careful of the multiple malus during the game !
